caption.p: Visualization of the (a) Electron density isosurface (contour 0.08 e/Å 3), (b) HOMO and (c) LUMO (contour 0.03 e/Å 3) of the different elongation isomers of B3LYP-D3/TZP optimized mer tris(trifluoroacetylacetonato)-manganese(III). Colour code use for molecule: C (grey), O (red), H (white), F (green) and Mn (turquoise).
